segments.text: Hello , could I speak to Mr . Wang , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry . He's out in a meeting now . Could I ask who is calling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Mr . Smith of XYZ Company . When will he be back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He'll be back at about five in the afternoon . Could I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Please tell him I called and ask him to return my call as soon as possible . It's about the PPT contract .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , Mr . Smith . I'll be sure he gets your message .
segments.speaker: S1
